comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
5 April 1943: The 56th FG wouldn't fly their first operational combat sortie for another three days, but SOMETHING blew the bottom out of the right wing's gun bay on P-47C serial 41-6257, assigned to the 63rd Fighter Squadron.

This was also the first day that all three squadrons of the 56th were now based on the same field, having recently moved from Kingscliffe.
